entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
